text: The Salvation Army Lass is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe Salvation Army LassThe Salvation Army Lass and stars Florence Lawrence, Harry Solter, and Charles Inslee. ==Actors== * Florence Lawrence as Mary Wilson * Harry Solter as Bob Walton * Charles Inslee as Harry Brown ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Salvation Army Lass
